co.cask.coopr.store.node

Interface NodeStoreView

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NodeStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSQLNodeStoreView, SQLAdminNodeStoreView, SQLNodeStore, SQLSystemNodeStoreView, SQLUserNodeStoreView

    public interface NodeStoreView
    A view of the node store as seen by a given account.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteNode(String nodeId)
      Delete the node with the given id.
      Set<Node> getAllNodes()
      Get an immutable set of all nodes in the store.
      Node getNode(String nodeId)
      Get the node with the given id.
      boolean nodeExists(String nodeId)
      Return whether or not the node with the given id exists or not, where existence is determined by whether or not the node is in the store, and not by whether or not there is an active node with the given id.
      void writeNode(Node node)
      Write a node to the store using its id.
      void writeNodes(Set<Node> nodes)
      Write a set of nodes to the store using its id.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllNodes

        Set<Node> getAllNodes()
                      throws IOException
        Get an immutable set of all nodes in the store.
        Returns:
        All nodes in the store.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem getting the nodes.

      • nodeExists

        boolean nodeExists(String nodeId)
                   throws IOException
        Return whether or not the node with the given id exists or not, where existence is determined by whether or not the node is in the store, and not by whether or not there is an active node with the given id.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - Id of the node.
        Returns:
        True if the node exists, False if not.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getNode

        Node getNode(String nodeId)
             throws IOException
        Get the node with the given id.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - Id of the node to get.
        Returns:
        The node with the given id, or null if none exists.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem getting the node.

      • deleteNode

        void deleteNode(String nodeId)
                throws IllegalAccessException,
                       IOException
        Delete the node with the given id.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - Id of the node to delete.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem deleting the node.
        IllegalAccessException

      • writeNode

        void writeNode(Node node)
               throws IllegalAccessException,
                      IOException
        Write a node to the store using its id.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to write.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem writing the node.
        IllegalAccessException

      • writeNodes

        void writeNodes(Set<Node> nodes)
                throws IllegalAccessException,
                       IOException
        Write a set of nodes to the store using its id.
        Parameters:
        nodes - Nodes to write.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was a problem writing the nodes.
        IllegalAccessException
